title.narrative: Institute for Workers and Trade Unions

participating-org.narrative: Institute for Workers and Trade Uni

The Institute for Workers and Trade Unions is a research institution under the Vietnam General Confederation of Labour, with a legal entity, a separate seal and headquarters in Hanoi. The institute receives funding, other operation means and a bank account.
The Institute for Workers and Trade Unions have the following functions:
Organizing research on basic theoretical and practical issues concerning the working class and trade unions. Based on the research results, providing scientific evidence to contribute to the policy-making process concerning the working class and trade unions in the new era.
Synthesizing scientific information that meets thetheoretical and practical research requirements of trade unions.
